## Get the data and do some cleaning
```{r}
library(rvest)
url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml"
html <- read_html(url)
tables <- html_table(html)


data <- tables[[1]]
actual_col_names <- data[1, ]
colnames(data) <- actual_col_names
data <- data[-1, ]
head(data, 3)

data$Votes <- as.numeric(data$Votes)

str(data)

data <- data[, -c(1)]

str(data)

show(data$Name)

data$Name <- gsub("X-", "", data$Name)

show(data$Name)

readr::write_csv(data, file="hvoss_data.csv")
```
